subject: Hockey, Ice
Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Miami Heat and the Chicago Blackhawks dominated their sports at the beginning of the season, but they have been tested in the N.B.A. and N.H.L. playoffs.
snippet: The Miami Heat and the Chicago Blackhawks dominated their sports at the beginning of the season, but they have been tested in the N.B.A. and N.H.L. playoffs.
